name: Man in the Hole
description:
* Exciting shooter with simple control, featuring wide range of weapons to try *

A cute alien dreaming earth invasion is stuck in the manhole!
He barely manages to call the rescue, but any tiny bit of damage will interrupt the call.
Protect the call by preventing falling objects hitting his spaceship on the ground.


* Bounce out or destroy any falling objects with your weapons.
* Collect powerful weapons through various challenges.
* Many boosts can be found to help you out.
* Get higher score and compete with your friends!


How to Play
* Just tap the screen where you want to shoot.
* Shoot at falling objects to bounce them off, and eventually they will be destroyed.
* Please note that some weapons may have different fire mechanisms.
